lead_paragraph: An African-centered charter school is praised by supporters as instilling confidence in students, even as their subpar national test scores have led to a recommendation to close the academy.

headline.print_headline: Poor Scores Leave Afrocentric School Vulnerable
headline.main: Poor Scores Leave an Afrocentric School in Chicago Vulnerable

snippet: An African-centered charter school is praised by supporters as instilling confidence in students, even as their subpar national test scores have led to a recommendation to close the academy.
abstract: Chicago public education officials move to close Barbara A Sizemore Academy, African-centered charter school posting low test scores, despite supporters' claims students are thriving socially; academy is one of dozens of Afrocentric schools across nation serving low-income students that are struggling to compete academically with larger, better-financed charter schools.
